name: tableau-navigator
title: Tableau Navigator
description: Search and open Tableau Dashboards and Views quickly.
author: endiruslan

commands.name: tableau-search
commands.title: Search Tableau
commands.description: Quickly search Tableau Dashboards and Views.

preferences.name: tableauServerUrl
preferences.title: Tableau Server URL
preferences.description: Your Tableau Server (or Cloud) address (e.g., https://tableau.example.com)

preferences.name: tableauApiVersion
preferences.title: Tableau API Version
preferences.description: Tableau REST API version (e.g., 3.24). Find in Tableau REST API docs.

preferences.name: personalAccessTokenName
preferences.title: Personal Access Token Name
preferences.description: The name you gave your PAT in Tableau.

preferences.name: personalAccessTokenSecret
preferences.title: Personal Access Token Secret
preferences.description: Your Tableau Personal Access Token secret. How to get: Login to Tableau -> My Account Settings -> Personal Access Tokens -> Create new token.

preferences.name: tableauSiteId
preferences.title: Tableau Site ID (Content URL)
preferences.description: The 'contentUrl' of your site. Leave empty for Default site. Find it in your Tableau site URL (e.g., 'yoursitename' in .../site/yoursitename/...).
preferences.placeholder: e.g., sales_analysis (optional, for Default site leave empty)
